item.ptxt: Measure inside diameter of oil pump body bushing.
If inside diameter exceeds limit, replace oil pump body.

spec.title: Oil pump body bushing inside diameter limit

item.ptxt: Measure inside diameter of stator shaft assembly bushing.
If inside diameter exceeds limit, replace stator shaft assembly.

spec.title: Stator shaft assembly bushing inside diameter limit

item.ptxt: Check oil pump body clearance of driven gear.
Push driven gear (1) to one side of oil pump body (2).
Using a feeler gauge, measure clearance between driven gear (1) and oil pump body (2).
If clearance exceeds standard value, replace oil pump assembly.

spec.title: Clearance between driven gear and oil pump body

item.ptxt: Check tip clearance of driven gear.
Measure radial clearance between driven and drive gears tooth tip.
If clearance exceeds standard value, replace oil pump assembly.

spec.title: Tip clearance between driven gear and drive gear

item.ptxt: Check side clearance of both gears.
Using a straightedge (1) and a feeler gauge, measure side clearance between gears and oil pump body.
If clearance exceeds standard value, replace oil pump assembly.

spec.title: Side clearance between gears and oil pump body
